Detailed Description

Header for a queue implemented with a circular array.

Author:
CSCI Dept. 1.0 Fall 2008
Bug:
The getVacancies() method is returning an incorrect value which is too large.
Todo:
Implement a method which provides a reference to the last item enqueued.
Remarks:
Code modified from Data Abstraction & Problem Solving with C++: Walls & Mirrors, 5ed, by F. M. Carrano Circular array-based queue implementation. The array has indices to the front and back of the queue. A counter tracks the count of items currently in the queue.
